mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO hxds.order_gps("id", "order_id", "driver_id", "customer_id", "latitude", "longitude", "speed", "create_time") VALUES(NEXT VALUE FOR hxds.og_sequence, ${orderId}, ${driverId}, ${customerId}, '${latitude}', '${longitude}', '${speed}', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT "id", "latitude", "longitude", TO_CHAR("create_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "createTime" FROM hxds.order_gps WHERE "order_id" = #{orderId}
SELECT "id", "latitude", "longitude", TO_CHAR("create_time",'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "createTime" FROM hxds.order_gps WHERE "order_id" = #{orderId} ORDER BY "id" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "latitude", "longitude" FROM hxds.order_gps WHERE "order_id" = #{orderId} ORDER BY "id"
